episodes.title: Episode 5.1
episodes.description: Ill omens and border raids make Uhtred extra-vigilant at his northern outpost. King Sigtryggr is visited by his notorious brother Rognvaldr.

episodes.title: Episode 5.2
episodes.description: A betrayal at Eoferwic sends Sigtryggr in search of aid, while Uhtred appeals to Æthelflæd for military support she cannot provide. Edward meets a new ally.

episodes.title: Episode 5.3
episodes.description: In the aftermath of the tragic battle for Eoferwic, Sigtryggr is forced to make a painful choice. Edward learns of Æthelhelm's intrigues in Mercia.

episodes.title: Episode 5.4
episodes.description: Rivals secretly promote competing successors upon the death of a Mercian ruler. Brida finds solace in the faith of her prisoner, Father Pyrlig.

episodes.title: Episode 5.5
episodes.description: Æthelhelm's subterfuge successfully stirs war tensions between Edward and Sigtryggr, but his thugs make a crucial mistake in attacking a pilgrimage.

episodes.title: Episode 5.6
episodes.description: Forces of Edward and Sigtryggr march toward battle as Uhtred races to reveal the truth of Æthelhelm's scheming and avert a ruinous war.

episodes.title: Episode 5.7
episodes.description: Edward offers a role to Stiorra that would restore her to power. Æthelhelm meets with a Saxon enemy. Uhtred has a long-overdue reckoning with Brida.

episodes.title: Episode 5.8
episodes.description: Learning of Æthelhelm's location, Uhtred proposes an audacious attack to rescue Ælfwynn and restore his birthright, but Edward is cautious.

episodes.title: Episode 5.9
episodes.description: Edward marches his troops north, while Uhtred recruits a small force to infiltrate Bebbanburg. King Constantin arrives to meet his new bride, Ælfwynn.

episodes.title: Episode 5.10
episodes.description: Armies converge in an epic, final showdown that determines the fate of a king's dream for England and Uhtred's hope of securing his family's future.
